summary: Fixed ReferenceError: getToken is not defined in ProfileTabPopover.js. Added missing import statement for getToken from helper-functions/getToken. Also changed getToken() call in JSX to use a pre-computed userToken variable to avoid potential React error #31 (calling functions in render).
current_status: getToken import error fixed. ProfileTabPopover now properly imports and uses getToken. Next.js rebuilt and restarted. Ready for testing Avatar click in header.
